Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
A model class that stores all game elements, used for game controller and renderer to get/set game elements and make new levels.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Wall(int width, int height, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
    Default class constructor, initialize game elements and make level 1.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame(int level)
      Reset the game to a specific level. Initialize all game elements to a new level state, if reset to level 1, clean the score.
      Parameters:
      level - the level to reset
